00033 #define IMAGE_HPP_

00035 #include <algorithm>
00036 #include <math.h>

00038 using namespace std;
00039 
00040 #define BLK_AVRG(nlin, ncol) {                                          \
00041     int k,l; int norm = ncol * nlin;                                    \
00042     int acc0=0, acc1=0, acc2=0;                                         \
00043     for (k=0; k<nlin; k++) {                                            \
00044       register T *pinptr = pin+k*in_mod0;                               \
00045       for (l=0; l<ncol; l++) {                                          \
00046         acc0 += pinptr[0];acc1 += pinptr[1];acc2 += pinptr[2];          \
00047         pinptr += in_mod1; }}                                           \
00048     pout[0] = acc0 / norm;pout[1] = acc1 / norm;pout[2] = acc2 / norm;}
00049 
00050 namespace ebl {
00051 
00052   template<class T> Idx<T> image_crop(Idx<T> &in, int x, int y, int w, int h){
00053     Idx<T> bla = in.narrow(0, h, y).narrow(1, w, x);
00054     Idx<T> bla3(bla.dim(0), bla.dim(1), bla.order() < 3 ? -1 : bla.dim(2));
00055     idx_copy(bla, bla3);
00056     return bla3;
00057   }
00058 
00059   template<class T> Idx<T> image_resize(Idx<T> &image, double w, double h, 
00060                                         int mode) {
00061     if (image.order() < 2) ylerror("image must have at least an order of 2.");
00062     // if data is not contiguous, copy it to a contiguous buffer
00063     Idx<T> contim(image);
00064     if (!image.contiguousp()) {
00065       IdxDim d(image.spec);
00066       Idx<T> tmp(d);
00067       idx_copy(image, tmp);
00068       contim = tmp;
00069     }
00070     intg imw = contim.dim(1);
00071     intg imh = contim.dim(0);
00072     if ((imw == 0) || (imh == 0))
00073       ylerror("cannot have dimensions of size 0");
00074     int rw = 0;
00075     int rh = 0;
00076     // determine actual size of output image
00077     if ((0 == w) || (0 == h)) {
00078       if (0 == w) {
00079         if (0 == h) {
00080           ylerror("desired width and height cannot be both zero");
00081         } else {
00082           w = max(1, (int) (imw * (h / imh)));
00083         }
00084       } else h = max(1, (int) (imh * (w / imw)));
00085     }
00086     else if (mode == 0) {
00087       double r = min(w / imw, h / imh);
00088       w = max(1, (int) (r * imw));
00089       h = max(1, (int) (r * imh));
00090     }
00091     else if (mode == 1) {
00092       w = max(1, (int) w);
00093       h = max(1, (int) h);
00094     }
00095     else if (mode == 2) {
00096       w = max(1, (int) (w * imw));
00097       h = max(1, (int) (h * imh));
00098     }
00099     else ylerror("image_resize: illegal mode or desired dimensions");
00100     // compute closest integer subsampling ratio
00101     rw = (int) (imw / w);
00102     rh = (int) (imh / h);
00103     // subsample by integer ratio if necessary
00104     if ((rh > 1) || (rw > 1)) {
00105       contim = image_subsample(contim, rh, rw);
00106       imw = contim.dim(1);
00107       imh = contim.dim(0);
00108     }
00109     // resample from subsampled image with bilinear interpolation
00110     Idx<T> rez((intg) h, (intg) w, (contim.order() == 3) ? contim.dim(2) : 1);
00111     Idx<T> bg(4);
00112     idx_clear(bg);
00113     // the 0.5 thingies are necessary because warp-bilin interprets
00114     // integer coordinates as being at the center of each pixel.
00115     float x1 = -0.5, y1 = -0.5, x3 = imw - 0.5, y3 = imh - 0.5;
00116     float p1 = -0.5, q1 = -0.5, p3 = w - 0.5, q3 = h - 0.5;
00117     image_warp_quad(contim, rez, bg, 1, x1, y1, x3, y1, x3, y3, x1, y3, 
00118                     p1, q1, p3, q3);
00119     if (contim.order() == 2)
00120       return rez.select(2, 0);
00121     return rez;
00122   }
00123 
00124   template<class T> 
00125   Idx<ubyte> grey_image_to_ubyte(Idx<T> &im, T minv, T maxv, 
00126                                  double zoomw, double zoomh) {
00127     if ((im.order() < 2) || (im.order() > 3) || 
00128         ((im.order() == 3) && (im.dim(2) != 1))) 
00129       ylerror("expecting a 2D Idx or a 3D Idx with 1 channel only");
00130     Idx<T> im1(im.dim(0), im.dim(1));
00131     if ((im.order() == 3) && (im.dim(2) == 1)) {
00132       Idx<T> tmp = im.select(2, 0);
00133       idx_copy(tmp, im1); // copy data to make it contiguous
00134     }
00135     else
00136       idx_copy(im, im1); // copy data to make it contiguous
00137     if ((zoomw <= 0.0) || (zoomh <= 0.0))
00138       ylerror("cannot zoom by a factor <= 0.0");
00139     if (minv > maxv) {
00140       T tmp = minv;
00141       minv = maxv;
00142       maxv = tmp;
00143     }
00144     if (minv == maxv) {
00145       minv = idx_min(im1);
00146       maxv = idx_max(im1);
00147     }
00148     int newh = im1.dim(0) * zoomh;
00149     int neww = im1.dim(1) * zoomw;
00150     Idx<T> im2 = ((newh == im1.dim(0)) && (neww == im1.dim(1))) ?
00151       im1 : image_resize(im1, newh, neww);
00152     Idx<ubyte> image(newh, neww);
00153     idx_subc_bounded(im2, minv, im2);
00154     idx_dotc_bounded(im2, (T) (255.0 / (double) (maxv - minv)), im2);
00155     idx_copy_clip(im2, image);
00156     return image;
00157   }
00158 
00159   template<class T> Idx<T> image_subsample_grayscale(Idx<T> &in, int nlin, int ncol) {
00160     intg h = in.dim(0);
00161     intg w = in.dim(1);
00162     intg nh = h / nlin;
00163     intg nw = w / ncol;
00164     Idx<T> out(nh, nw);
00165     if ((nlin == 1) && (ncol == 1)) {
00166       idx_copy(in, out);
00167       return out;
00168     }
00169     Idx<T> inp = in.narrow(0, nlin * nh, 0);
00170     inp = inp.narrow(1, ncol * nw, 0);
00171     T *_idx2loopc1, *pin;
00172     T *_idx2loopc2, *pout;
00173     int i, _imax = out.dim(0);
00174     int j, _jmax = out.dim(1);
00175     int _imat1_m0 = inp.mod(0);
00176     int _imat1_m1 = inp.mod(1);
00177     int _imat2_m0 = out.mod(0);
00178     int _imat2_m1 = out.mod(1);
00179     int pin_incr = ncol * _imat1_m1;
00180     int norm = ncol * nlin;
00181     register int acc0;
00182     register int k,l;
00183     register T *pinptr;
00184     register int pinptr_incr = _imat1_m0 - ncol* _imat1_m1;
00185     _idx2loopc1 = inp.idx_ptr();
00186     _idx2loopc2 = out.idx_ptr();
00187     for (i = 0; i < _imax; i++) {
00188       pin = _idx2loopc1;
00189       pout = _idx2loopc2;
00190       for (j = 0; j < _jmax; j++) {
00191         acc0 =0;
00192         pinptr = pin;
00193         for (k=0; k<nlin; k++) {
00194           for (l=0; l<ncol; l++) {
00195             acc0 += pinptr[0];
00196             pinptr += _imat1_m1;
00197           }
00198           pinptr += pinptr_incr;
00199         }
00200         pout[0] = acc0/norm;
00201         pin += pin_incr;
00202         pout += _imat2_m1;
00203       }
00204       _idx2loopc1 += _imat1_m0 * nlin;
00205       _idx2loopc2 += _imat2_m0;
00206     }
00207     return out;
00208   }
00209 
00210   template<class T> Idx<T> image_subsample_rgb(Idx<T> &in, int nlin, int ncol) {
00211     intg h = in.dim(0);
00212     intg w = in.dim(1);
00213     intg nh = h / nlin;
00214     intg nw = w / ncol;
00215     Idx<T> out(nh, nw, in.dim(2));
00216     if ((nlin == 1) && (ncol == 1)) {
00217       idx_copy(in, out);
00218       return out;
00219     }
00220     Idx<T> inp = in.narrow(0, nlin * nh, 0).narrow(1, ncol * nw, 0);
00221     T *in_line, *pin;
00222     T *out_line, *pout;
00223     int i, _imax = out.dim(0);
00224     int j, _jmax = out.dim(1);
00225     int in_mod0 = inp.mod(0);
00226     int in_mod1 = inp.mod(1);
00227     int out_mod0 = out.mod(0);
00228     int out_mod1 = out.mod(1);
00229     int pin_incr = ncol * in_mod1;
00230     in_line = inp.idx_ptr();
00231     out_line = out.idx_ptr();
00232     for (i = 0; i < _imax; i++) {
00233       pin = in_line;
00234       pout = out_line;
00235       for (j = 0; j < _jmax; j++) {
00236         BLK_AVRG(nlin, ncol);
00237         pin += pin_incr;
00238         pout += out_mod1;
00239       }
00240       in_line += in_mod0 * nlin;
00241       out_line += out_mod0;
00242     }
00243     return out;
00244   }
00245 
00246   template<class T> Idx<T> image_subsample(Idx<T> &in, int nlin, int ncol) {
00247     switch (in.order()) {
00248     case 2:
00249       return image_subsample_grayscale(in, nlin, ncol);
00250     case 3:
00251       return image_subsample_rgb(in, nlin, ncol);
00252     default:
00253       ylerror("image must have at least an order of 2.");
00254       return in;
00255     }
00256   }
00257 
00258   template<class T> void image_warp_quad(Idx<T> &in, Idx<T> &out,
00259                                          Idx<T> &background, int mode,
00260                                          float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2, float x3, float y3,
00261                                          float x4, float y4, float p1, float q1, float p3, float q3) {
00262     intg outi = out.dim(0);
00263     intg outj = out.dim(1);
00264     Idx<int> dispi(outi, outj);
00265     Idx<int> dispj(outi, outj);
00266     compute_bilin_transform<float>(dispi, dispj, x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3,
00267                                    x4, y4, p1, q1, p3, q3);
00268     if (0 == mode)
00269       image_warp_fast(in, out, background.idx_ptr(), dispi, dispj);
00270     else
00271       image_warp(in, out, background, dispi, dispj);
00272   }
00273 
00274 
00275   template<class T> void image_warp(Idx<T> &in, Idx<T> &out, Idx<T> &background,
00276                                     Idx<int> &pi, Idx<int> &pj) {
00277     T* pin = in.idx_ptr();
00278     int indimi = in.dim(0);
00279     int indimj = in.dim(1);
00280     int inmodi = in.mod(0);
00281     int inmodj = in.mod(1);
00282     int ppi, ppj;
00283     { idx_bloop3(lout, out, T, lpi, pi, int, lpj, pj, int) {
00284         { idx_bloop3(llout, lout, T, llpi, lpi, int, llpj, lpj, int) {
00285             ppi = llpi.get();
00286             ppj = llpj.get();
00287             image_interpolate_bilin(background.idx_ptr(), pin, indimi, indimj,
00288                                     inmodi, inmodj, ppi, ppj, llout.idx_ptr(), (int) out.dim(2));
00289           }}
00290       }}
00291   }
00292 
00293   template<class T> void image_warp_fast(Idx<T> &in, Idx<T> &out, T *background,
00294                                          Idx<int> &pi, Idx<int> &pj) {
00295     T* pin = in.idx_ptr();
00296     int indimi = in.dim(0);
00297     int indimj = in.dim(1);
00298     int inmodi = in.mod(0);
00299     int inmodj = in.mod(1);
00300     int ppi, ppj;
00301     register int li, lj;
00302     register T *inn, *outt;
00303     int outsize = out.dim(2);
00304     { idx_bloop3(lout, out, T, lpi, pi, int, lpj, pj, int) {
00305         { idx_bloop3(llout, lout, T, llpi, lpi, int, llpj, lpj, int) {
00306             outt = llout.idx_ptr();
00307             ppi = llpi.get();
00308             ppj = llpj.get();
00309             li = (ppi+0x7f) >> 16;
00310             lj = (ppj+0x7f) >> 16;
00311             if ((li>=0) && (li<indimi) && (lj>=0) && (lj<indimj)) {
00312               inn = (T*)(pin) + inmodi * li + inmodj * lj;
00313               outt[0] = inn[0];
00314               if (outsize >= 3) {
00315                 outt[1] = inn[1];
00316                 outt[2] = inn[2];
00317               }
00318               if (outsize >= 4)
00319                 outt[3] = inn[3];
00320             } else {
00321               outt[0] = *(background);
00322               if (outsize >= 3) {
00323                 outt[1] = *(background+1);
00324                 outt[2] = *(background+2);
00325               }
00326               if (outsize >= 4)
00327                 outt[3] = *(background+3);
00328             }
00329           }}
00330       }}
00331   }
00332 
00333   template<class T> void image_interpolate_bilin(T* background, T *pin,
00334                                                  int indimi, int indimj, int inmodi, int inmodj, int ppi, int ppj,
00335                                                  T* out, int outsize) {
00336     int li0, lj0;
00337     register int li1, lj1;
00338     int deltai, ndeltai;
00339     int deltaj, ndeltaj;
00340     register T *pin00;
00341     register T *v00, *v01, *v10, *v11;
00342     li0 = ppi >> 16;
00343     li1 = li0+1;
00344     deltai = ppi & 0x0000ffff;
00345     ndeltai = 0x00010000 - deltai;
00346     lj0 = ppj  >> 16;
00347     lj1 = lj0+1;
00348     deltaj = ppj & 0x0000ffff;
00349     ndeltaj = 0x00010000 - deltaj;
00350     pin00 = (T*)(pin) + inmodi * li0 + inmodj * lj0;
00351     if ((li1>0)&&(li1<indimi)) {
00352       if ((lj1>0)&&(lj1<indimj)) {
00353         v00 = (pin00);
00354         v01 = (pin00+inmodj);
00355         v11 = (pin00+inmodi+inmodj);
00356         v10 = (pin00+inmodi);
00357       } else if (lj1==0) {
00358         v00 = background;
00359         v01 = (pin00+inmodj);
00360         v11 = (pin00+inmodi+inmodj);
00361         v10 = background;
00362       } else if (lj1==indimj) {
00363         v00 = (pin00);
00364         v01 = background;
00365         v11 = background;
00366         v10 = (pin00+inmodi);
00367       } else {
00368         v00 = background;
00369         v01 = background;
00370         v11 = background;
00371         v10 = background;
00372       }
00373     } else if (li1==0) {
00374       if ((lj1>0)&&(lj1<indimj)) {
00375         v00 = background;
00376         v01 = background;
00377         v11 = (pin00+inmodi+inmodj);
00378         v10 = (pin00+inmodi);
00379       } else if (lj1==0) {
00380         v00 = background;
00381         v01 = background;
00382         v11 = (pin00+inmodi+inmodj);
00383         v10 = background;
00384       } else if (lj1==indimj) {
00385         v00 = background;
00386         v01 = background;
00387         v11 = background;
00388         v10 = (pin00+inmodi);
00389       } else {
00390         v00 = background;
00391         v01 = background;
00392         v11 = background;
00393         v10 = background;
00394       }
00395     } else if (li1==indimi) {
00396       if ((lj1>0)&&(lj1<indimj)) {
00397         v00 = (pin00);
00398         v01 = (pin00+inmodj);
00399         v11 = background;
00400         v10 = background;
00401       } else if (lj1==0) {
00402         v00 = background;
00403         v01 = (pin00+inmodj);
00404         v11 = background;
00405         v10 = background;
00406       } else if (lj1==indimj) {
00407         v00 = (pin00);
00408         v01 = background;
00409         v11 = background;
00410         v10 = background;
00411       } else {
00412         v00 = background;
00413         v01 = background;
00414         v11 = background;
00415         v10 = background;
00416       }
00417     } else {
00418       v00 = background;
00419       v01 = background;
00420       v11 = background;
00421       v10 = background;
00422     }
00423     // TODO: this does not work for ubyte (cf ubyte implementation in image.cpp),
00424     // make it generic to avoid code redondancy.
00425     double dd = 1.0 / 65536.0;
00426     T d = (T) dd;
00427     if (sizeof (T) <= 2)
00428       d = 0;
00429     if (outsize == 1)
00430       *out = (ndeltaj * (( *v10*deltai + *v00*ndeltai )*d) +
00431               deltaj  * (( *v11*deltai + *v01*ndeltai )*d))*d;
00432     else {
00433       if (outsize >= 3) {
00434         *out = (ndeltaj * (( v10[0]*deltai + v00[0]*ndeltai )*d) +
00435                 deltaj  * (( v11[0]*deltai + v01[0]*ndeltai )*d))*d;
00436         *(out + 1) = (ndeltaj * (( v10[1]*deltai + v00[1]*ndeltai )*d) +
00437                       deltaj  * (( v11[1]*deltai + v01[1]*ndeltai )*d))*d;
00438         *(out + 2) = (ndeltaj * (( v10[2]*deltai + v00[2]*ndeltai )*d) +
00439                       deltaj  * (( v11[2]*deltai + v01[2]*ndeltai )*d))*d;
00440       }
00441       if (outsize >= 4) {
00442         *(out + 3) = (ndeltaj * (( v10[3]*deltai + v00[3]*ndeltai )*d) +
00443                       deltaj  * (( v11[3]*deltai + v01[3]*ndeltai )*d))*d;
00444       }
00445     }
00446   }
00447 
00448   template<class T> void compute_bilin_transform(Idx<int> &dispi, Idx<int> &dispj,
00449                                                  float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2, float x3, float y3,
00450                                                  float x4, float y4, float p1, float q1, float p3, float q3) {
00451     // compute transformation matrix from coordinates
00452     // in target (rectangular) space to coordinates
00453     // in original (irregular quadrilateral) image
00454     // transformation matrix is in 16.16 fixed point format.
00455     float k = 65536 / ((p3 - p1) * (q3 - q1));
00456     float x41 = x4 - x1;
00457     float x21 = x2 - x1;
00458     float x43 = x4 - x3;
00459     float x23 = x2 - x3;
00460     int mx0 = (int) (k * ((q3 * x21) + (q1 * x43)));
00461     int mx1 = (int) (k * ((p3 * x41) + (p1 * x23)));
00462     int mx2 = (int) ((-k) * (x41 + x23));
00463     int mx3 = (int) (k * (((p3 * q3 * x1) + (p1 * q1 * x3)) -
00464                           ((p1 * q3 * x2) + (p3 * q1 * x4))));
00465     float y41 = y4 - y1;
00466     float y21 = y2 - y1;
00467     float y43 = y4 - y3;
00468     float y23 = y2 - y3;
00469     int my0 = (int) (k * ((q3 * y21) + (q1 * y43)));
00470     int my1 = (int) (k * ((p3 * y41) + (p1 * y23)));
00471     int my2 = (int) ((-k) * (y41 + y23));
00472     int my3 = (int) (k * (((p3 * q3 * y1) + (p1 * q1 * y3)) -
00473                           ((p1 * q3 * y2) + (p3 * q1 * y4))));
00474     int q = 0, p = 0;
00475     { idx_bloop2(ispi, dispi, int, ispj, dispj, int) {
00476         p = 0;
00477         { idx_bloop2(di, ispi, int, dj, ispj, int) {
00478             di.set(my0 * p + my1 * q + my2 * p * q + my3);
00479             dj.set(mx0 * p + mx1 * q + mx2 * p * q + mx3);
00480             p++;
00481           }}
00482         q++;
00483       }}
00484   }
00485 
00486   template<class T> void image_rotscale(Idx<T> &src, Idx<T> &out,
00487                                         double sx, double sy, double dx, double dy,
00488                                         double angle, double coeff, Idx<ubyte> &bg){
00489     double q = 1000;
00490     double coeff_inv = 1/coeff;
00491     double sa = q*sin(angle * 0.017453292);
00492     double ca = q*cos(angle * 0.017453292);
00493     double ca_plus_sa = coeff_inv * (sa + ca);
00494     double ca_minus_sa = coeff_inv * (ca - sa);
00495     float x1 = sx - ca_plus_sa;
00496     float y1 = sy - ca_minus_sa;
00497     float x2 = sx + ca_minus_sa;
00498     float y2 = sy - ca_plus_sa;
00499     float x3 = sx + ca_plus_sa;
00500     float y3 = sy + ca_minus_sa;
00501     float x4 = sx - ca_minus_sa;
00502     float y4 = sy + ca_plus_sa;
00503     float p1 = dx-q;
00504     float q1 = dy-q;
00505     float p3 = dx + q;
00506     float q3 = dy + q;
00507     image_warp_quad(src, out, bg, 1, x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3, x4, y4, p1, q1, p3, q3);
00508   }
00509 
00510 
00511 
00512   template<class T> void image_draw_box(Idx<T> &img, T val,
00513                                         unsigned int x, unsigned int y, unsigned int dx, unsigned int dy) {
00514     idx_checkorder1(img, 2);
00515     for (unsigned int i = x; i < x + dx; ++i) {
00516       img.set(val, i, y);
00517       img.set(val, i, y + dy);
00518     }
00519     for (unsigned int j = y; j < y + dy; ++j) {
00520       img.set(val, x, j);
00521       img.set(val, x + dx, j);
00522     }
00523   }
00524 
00525   template<class T> bool pnm_fread_into_rgbx(const char *fname, Idx<T> &out) {
00526     Idx<ubyte> tmp(1,1,1);
00527     bool ret = pnm_fread_into_rgbx(fname, tmp);
00528     out.resize(tmp.dim(0), tmp.dim(1), tmp.dim(2));
00529     idx_copy(tmp, out);
00530     return ret;
00531   }
00532 
00533   template<class T> bool image_read_rgbx(const char *fname, Idx<T> &out) {
00534     Idx<ubyte> tmp(1,1,1);
00535     bool ret = image_read_rgbx(fname, tmp);
00536     out.resize(tmp.dim(0), tmp.dim(1), tmp.dim(2));
00537     idx_copy(tmp, out);
00538     return ret;
00539   }
00540 
00542   // Utilities
00543 
00544   template<class T> void RGBtoYUV1D(Idx<T> &rgb, Idx<T> &yuv) {
00545     if (rgb.idx_ptr() == yuv.idx_ptr()) {
00546       ylerror("RGBtoYUV: dst must be different than src");
00547       return ;
00548     }
00549     yuv.set(0.257 * rgb.get(0) + 0.504 * rgb.get(1) + 0.098 * rgb.get(2) + 16, 0);
00550     yuv.set(0.439 * rgb.get(0) - (0.368 * rgb.get(1)) - (0.071 * rgb.get(2)) + 128, 1);
00551     yuv.set(-(0.148 * rgb.get(0)) - (0.291 * rgb.get(1)) + 0.439 * rgb.get(2) + 128, 2);
00552   }
00553 
00554   template<class T> void RGBtoYUV(Idx<T> &rgb, Idx<T> &yuv) {
00555     idx_checknelems2_all(rgb, yuv);
00556     switch (rgb.order()) {
00557     case 1: // process 1 pixel
00558       RGBtoYUV1D(rgb, yuv);
00559       return ;
00560     case 3: // process 2D image
00561       { idx_bloop2(rg, rgb, T, yu, yuv, T) {
00562           { idx_bloop2(r, rg, T, y, yu, T) {
00563               RGBtoYUV1D(r, y);
00564             }}
00565         }}
00566       return ;
00567     default:
00568       ylerror("RGBtoYUV dimension not implemented");
00569     }
00570   }
00571 
00572   template<class T> void YUVtoRGB1D(Idx<T> &yuv, Idx<T> &rgb) {
00573     if (rgb.idx_ptr() == yuv.idx_ptr()) {
00574       ylerror("YUVtoRGB: dst must be different than src");
00575       return ;
00576     }
00577     rgb.set(1.164 * (yuv.get(0) - 16) + 2.018 * (yuv.get(1) - 128), 0);
00578     rgb.set(1.164 * (yuv.get(0) - 16) - 0.813 * (yuv.get(2) - 128)
00579             - 0.391 * (yuv.get(1) - 128), 1);
00580     rgb.set(1.164 * (yuv.get(0) - 16) + 1.596 * (yuv.get(2) - 128), 2);
00581   }
00582 
00583   template<class T> void YUVtoRGB(Idx<T> &yuv, Idx<T> &rgb) {
00584     idx_checknelems2_all(rgb, yuv);
00585     switch (yuv.order()) {
00586     case 1: // process 1 pixel
00587       YUVtoRGB1D(yuv, rgb);
00588       return ;
00589     case 3: // process 2D image
00590       { idx_bloop2(rg, rgb, T, yu, yuv, T) {
00591           { idx_bloop2(r, rg, T, y, yu, T) {
00592               YUVtoRGB1D(y, r);
00593             }}
00594         }}
00595       return ;
00596     default:
00597       ylerror("YUVtoRGB dimension not implemented");
00598     }
00599   }
